title: Tighten layout
summary: Remove excess whitespace, prevent horizontal scroll
prompt: Tighten layout; remove excess whitespace and prevent horizontal scroll; preserve padding for readability.

title: Fix alignment
prompt: Fix alignment; ensure flex or grid items line up consistently; center vertically if misaligned.

title: Floating copy box
summary: Keep copy UI visible on scroll
prompt: Make the copy box float; position fixed to left side of viewport; remains visible while scrolling.

title: Responsive layout
summary: Stack on mobile, inline on desktop
prompt: Ensure responsive layout; elements stack on small screens and align inline on large.

title: Add conditional logic
prompt: Add logic so that when [condition], [action] happens automatically; preserve existing behaviour otherwise.

title: Live binding
prompt: Bind input values directly to output field updates; changes appear live without reloading.

title: Input validation
summary: Check required fields and show errors
prompt: Validate user input for required fields; display inline error messages in red text.

title: Debounce
prompt: Debounce live input updates; prevent excessive event calls.

title: Fallbacks
prompt: Add fallback if data missing; display placeholder text instead of error.

title: Serialize to JSON
prompt: Serialize form data as JSON and store in localStorage; include timestamp and user ID.

title: Mapping file
prompt: Map option codes from options.txt to readable text; handle missing keys gracefully.

title: Export depot schema
prompt: Export structured JSON matching depot_notes.schema; download as file or copy to clipboard.

title: Robust import
summary: Restore UI state and guard errors
prompt: Ensure imported JSON restores all UI state correctly; handle invalid JSON safely.

title: Step wizard
prompt: Convert static sections into step-based wizard; add next/previous buttons and progress indicator.

title: Gate future steps
prompt: Highlight current step and disable navigation to future steps until current complete.

title: Scroll to top
prompt: Scroll to top of section on step change; smooth scrolling.

title: Breadcrumbs
prompt: Add breadcrumbs to show step titles; link back to previous sections.

title: Console markers
prompt: Add console.log markers for key functions; include step names for debugging clarity.

title: Cache bust
prompt: Cache bust version; append ?v=[timestamp] to script and stylesheet imports.

title: Load optimisation
prompt: Optimise image and script loading; use async/defer where possible.

title: Single combined copy
prompt: Generate a single combined copy box containing all sections separated by semicolons; easy to paste into Depot.

title: Multiple output modes
prompt: Allow multiple selectable output formats: Customer Summary (friendly), Engineer Notes (technical), Depot Format (semicolon). Use floating UI for copy buttons on desktop; fixed bottom bar on mobile.

title: Frontend
summary: Visible part users interact with (HTML, CSS, JS, SwiftUI).
prompt: Frontend: Visible part users interact with (HTML, CSS, JS, SwiftUI).

title: Backend
prompt: Backend: Handles logic, data, and APIs.

title: PWA
summary: Progressive Web App that installs and works offline.
prompt: PWA: Progressive Web App that installs and works offline.

title: Manifest file
summary: Defines name, icons, theme, and install behaviour.
prompt: Manifest file: Defines name, icons, theme, and install behaviour.

title: Service Worker
prompt: Service Worker: Manages offline caching and updates.

title: Component
summary: Reusable building block like a button, step, or widget.
prompt: Component: Reusable building block like a button, step, or widget.

title: Module
summary: Collection of related components or features.
prompt: Module: Collection of related components or features.

title: State
summary: Current data or condition of the app.
prompt: State: Current data or condition of the app.

title: Event listener
summary: Detects user actions like clicks or input.
prompt: Event listener: Detects user actions like clicks or input.

title: DOM
summary: Browser’s live page structure controlled by JavaScript.
prompt: DOM: Browser’s live page structure controlled by JavaScript.

title: UI
summary: User interface—the part that is seen.
prompt: UI: User interface—the part that is seen.

title: UX
summary: User experience—how it feels to use.
prompt: UX: User experience—how it feels to use.

title: Responsive design
prompt: Responsive design: Adapts layout to screen size.

prompt: Container: Wrapper element for content.

prompt: Margin: Space outside an element.

title: Overflow
summary: Behaviour when content exceeds its space.
prompt: Overflow: Behaviour when content exceeds its space.
